original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 320/325 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT-  Sri Lanka’s bond market closed steady on Wednesday ahead of the New Year holidays, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed 27.30/90 percent down from at 27.45/75 percent on Tuesday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2025 closed at 25.80/26.00 down from 25.75/95 percent a day earlier.
The rupee closed at 320/325 to the US dollar in the spot market depreciation from Tuesday’s close at 319.50/320 rupees. (Colombo/Apr12/2023)
